entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:56 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
